statements: SELECT * FROM WasteRecyclingProcesses
SELECT process_id, process_name, material_used FROM WasteRecyclingProcesses
SELECT * FROM WasteRecyclingProcesses WHERE material_used = 'Plastic'
SELECT * FROM WasteRecyclingProcesses WHERE recycle_percentage > 50
SELECT process_name, recycle_percentage FROM WasteRecyclingProcesses ORDER BY recycle_percentage DESC
SELECT * FROM WasteRecyclingProcesses WHERE recycle_percentage > 50 ORDER BY process_name DESC;
SELECT process_name, material_used FROM WasteRecyclingProcesses WHERE material_used LIKE '%plastic%' ORDER BY recycle_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteRecyclingProcesses WHERE process_id IN (1, 3, 5) OR recycle_percentage < 30;
SELECT process_name, recycle_percentage FROM WasteRecyclingProcesses WHERE recycle_percentage BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY recycle_percentage ASC;
SELECT process_name, material_used, recycle_percentage FROM WasteRecyclingProcesses WHERE material_used IS NOT NULL ORDER BY process_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementProcesses WHERE process_name = 'Recycling';
SELECT material_name, category FROM RecyclingMaterials WHERE category = 'Plastic';
SELECT process_id, location FROM WasteManagementProcesses WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementProcesses WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT process_id, process_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM WasteManagementProcesses WHERE process_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementProcesses WHERE location = 'City A' AND start_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT process_name, location FROM WasteManagementProcesses WHERE process_id > 5 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, recycling_fee FROM RecyclingMaterials WHERE category = 'Plastic' ORDER BY recycling_fee ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementProcesses INNER JOIN RecyclingMaterials ON WasteManagementProcesses.process_id = RecyclingMaterials.material_id WHERE RecyclingMaterials.category = 'Glass';
SELECT process_name, start_date, end_date FROM WasteManagementProcesses WHERE end_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM WasteRecyclingProcesses;
SELECT process_name, start_date, end_date FROM WasteRecyclingProcesses WHERE id = 3;
SELECT process_name, process_description FROM WasteRecyclingProcesses WHERE process_name LIKE '%plastic%';
SELECT material_name, recycling_percentage FROM WasteMaterials ORDER BY recycling_percentage DESC;
SELECT operation_name, operation_date, operation_location FROM WasteManagementOperations WHERE operation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM WasteRecyclingProcesses WHERE process_name = 'Recycling Process A';
SELECT process_name, process_description, start_date FROM WasteRecyclingProcesses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM WasteMaterials WHERE recycling_percentage > 50 AND material_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT operation_name, operation_type, operation_date FROM WasteManagementOperations WHERE operation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM WasteMaterials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_recycling_process;
SELECT process_id, process_name, process_status FROM waste_recycling_process WHERE process_type='Organic';
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_quantity FROM materials_used WHERE material_type='Plastic' ORDER BY material_quantity DESC;
SELECT operation_name, operation_type FROM waste_management_operations ORDER BY operation_id ASC;
SELECT stats_value FROM recycling_statistics WHERE process_id=1 AND material_id=3 AND operation_id=2;
SELECT * FROM waste_recycling_process;
SELECT process_name, process_type FROM waste_recycling_process ORDER BY process_type DESC;
SELECT process_id, process_name, process_type, process_status FROM waste_recycling_process WHERE process_type = 'Recycling';
SELECT * FROM recycling_statistics WHERE stats_value > 100 ORDER BY stats_value DESC;

SELECT process_name, material_name, operation_name FROM waste_recycling_process JOIN materials_used ON waste_recycling_process.process_id = recycling_statistics.process_id JOIN waste_management_operations ON waste_management_operations.operation_id = recycling_statistics.operation_id;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingCenter;
SELECT id, name, location FROM RecyclingCenter;
SELECT category_name, description FROM WasteCategory WHERE id = 1;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM Materials WHERE recyclable = true;
SELECT disposal_date, disposal_location, amount FROM WasteDisposal ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingCenter WHERE id = 1;
SELECT category_name, description FROM WasteCategory WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM Materials WHERE recyclable = TRUE AND material_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT * FROM RecyclingTransactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' AND amount >= 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT disposal_date, amount FROM WasteDisposal WHERE disposal_location = 'Landfill' ORDER BY disposal_date ASC;
